generated.css: #activity-list td{overflow-wrap:break-word}td.time{white-space:nowrap;text-align:right;padding-right:.2em;padding-left:.2em}td.symbol{padding-right:1em}td.action{white-space:nowrap;padding-left:.2em;padding-right:.2em}.action>button{margin:0;padding:0 .2em;display:none}tr:hover .action>button{display:initial}.running{border:.3em solid transparent;border-top:.25em solid #6495ed;border-radius:50%;animation:spin 8s linear infinite}.overrun,.running{width:1em;height:1em}.overrun{border-left:.3em solid transparent;border-top:.3em solid transparent;border-color:red transparent transparent red;border-style:solid;border-width:.25em .3em .3em .25em;border-radius:50%;animation:spin 2s ease infinite}@keyframes spin{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}
